headline: High Expenses & Lower Fee Income Likely to Hurt HBAN's Q4 Earnings
summary: Huntington Bancshares is set to report Q4 and full-year results on Jan. 22, with higher expenses and weaker fee income likely to offset gains in loans and NII.

headline: Downtown Frederick Partnership receives grant from Truist Foundation to support launch of first Retail Incubator in Downtown Frederick, MD
summary: Downtown Frederick Partnership has received a grant from Truist Foundation to launch a new Retail Incubator, providing unprecedented support for emerging entrepreneurs and expanding diversity in business ownership and opportunity in Downtown Frederick. Downtown Frederick Partnership will manage the program in partnership with SOUL Street, a Frederick-based collective of Black business owners and community leaders dedicated to fostering entrepreneurial success.

headline: Is Cluster of Bullish Analyst Notes on Service Quality Altering The Investment Case For Old Dominion Freight Line (ODFL)?
summary: In recent days, multiple research firms including Truist, Evercore ISI, Barclays, and Wedgewood Partners have reiterated confidence in Old Dominion Freight Line, emphasizing its dependable less-than-truckload service, strong cost control, and ongoing investments despite freight-market uncertainty. This cluster of upbeat commentary highlights Old Dominion’s reputation for premium service quality, such as very high on-time performance and low freight damage, as a key differentiator that is...
